includedAssets.title: Day 3: 1:00 P.M. To 2:00 P.M.
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep1 - Day 3: 1:00 P.M. To 2:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: The clock starts ticking for Jack once again when CTU receive word that a deadly virus is just hours away from being released upon LA.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: CTU receive word that a deadly virus is just hours away from being released upon LA.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The clock starts ticking for Jack once again when CTU receive word that a deadly virus is just hours away from being released upon LA.

includedAssets.title: Day 3: 2:00 P.M. To 3:00 P.M.
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep2 - Day 3: 2:00 P.M. To 3:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: A tip-off leads Jack to the last known address of the first virus victim... and into a confrontation with Chase. Salazar contacts an informant.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A tip-off leads Jack to the last known address of the first virus victim... and into a confrontation with Chase. Salazar contacts an informant.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A tip-off leads Jack to the last known address of the first virus victim... and into a confrontation with Chase. Salazar contacts an informant.

includedAssets.title: Day 3: 3:00 P.M. To 4:00 P.M.
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep3 - Day 3: 3:00 P.M. To 4:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Pressure cooker action. As Jack closes in on Kyle, Gael takes drastic counter measures. President Palmer faces a tough decision over Anne.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Pressure cooker action. As Jack closes in on Kyle, Gael takes drastic counter measures. President Palmer faces a tough decision over Anne.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Pressure cooker action. As Jack closes in on Kyle, Gael takes drastic counter measures. President Palmer faces a tough decision over Anne.

includedAssets.title: Day 3: 4:00 P.M. To 5:00 P.M.
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep4 - Day 3: 4:00 P.M. To 5:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: With Kyle missing and Palmer on the verge of agreeing to the terrorists' demands, it seems all is lost... until Jack offers a third, risky, solution.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: With Kyle missing and Palmer on the verge of agreeing to the terrorists' demands, it seems all is lost... until Jack offers a third, risky, solution.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: With Kyle missing and Palmer on the verge of agreeing to the terrorists' demands, it seems all is lost... until Jack offers a third, risky, solution.

includedAssets.title: Day 3: 5:00 P.M. To 6:00 P.M.
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep5 - Day 3: 5:00 P.M. To 6:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: During the prison break, Jack and Salazar are taken hostage by other prisoners; the CTU closes in on Kyle; and Kim and Chloe learn of Jack's drug use.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: During the prison break, Jack and Salazar are taken hostage by other prisoners; the CTU closes in on Kyle; and Kim and Chloe learn of Jack's drug use.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: During the prison break, Jack and Salazar are taken hostage by other prisoners; the CTU closes in on Kyle; and Kim and Chloe learn of Jack's drug use.

includedAssets.title: Day 3: 6:00 P.M. To 7:00 P.M.
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep6 - Day 3: 6:00 P.M. To 7:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: After Kyle is captured, the CTU agents try to stop Jack from escaping with Ramon Salazar.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: After Kyle is captured, the CTU agents try to stop Jack from escaping with Ramon Salazar.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: After Kyle is captured, the CTU agents try to stop Jack from escaping with Ramon Salazar.

includedAssets.title: Day 3: 7:00 P.M. To 8:00 P.M.
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep7 - Day 3: 7:00 P.M. To 8:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: CTU are on tenterhooks as news of Jack's deceit spreads. Chase lives up to his name and heads to Mexico while Gael spills the beans on the Salazars.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: CTU are on tenterhooks as news of Jack's deceit spreads. Chase lives up to his name and heads to Mexico while Gael spills the beans on the Salazars.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: CTU are on tenterhooks as news of Jack's deceit spreads. Chase lives up to his name and heads to Mexico while Gael spills the beans on the Salazars.

includedAssets.title: Day 3: 8:00 P.M. To 9:00 P.M.
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep8 - Day 3: 8:00 P.M. To 9:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Tony reveals how he and Gael have been helping Jack re-infiltrate the Salazar organization, but back in Mexico, Ramon is growing suspicious.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Tony reveals how he and Gael have been helping Jack re-infiltrate the Salazar organization, but back in Mexico, Ramon is growing suspicious.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Tony reveals how he and Gael have been helping Jack re-infiltrate the Salazar organization, but back in Mexico, Ramon is growing suspicious.

includedAssets.title: Day 3: 9:00 P.M. To 10:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Jack and the Salazars learn they have a rival in the auction for the virus, and Kim and Michelle worry that Tony isn't fit for duty.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jack and the Salazars learn they have a rival in the auction for the virus, and Kim and Michelle worry that Tony isn't fit for duty.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jack and the Salazars learn they have a rival in the auction for the virus, and Kim and Michelle worry that Tony isn't fit for duty.

includedAssets.title: Day 3: 10:00 P.M. To 11:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Claudia gives Chase a fighting chance while Jack pumps Nina for information. Meanwhile, Palmer's presidential campaign is about to hit a bump.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Claudia gives Chase a fighting chance while Jack pumps Nina for information. Meanwhile, Palmer's presidential campaign is about to hit a bump.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Claudia gives Chase a fighting chance while Jack pumps Nina for information. Meanwhile, Palmer's presidential campaign is about to hit a bump.

includedAssets.title: Day 3: 11:00 P.M. To 12 Midnight
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep11 - Day 3: 11:00 P.M. To 12 Midnight
includedAssets.synopsis: While Jack and the Salazars prepare to take Nina to meet Amador, Chase moves into position with the CTU Delta team; and Sherry helps Palmer fight Milliken.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Jack and the Salazars prepare to take Nina to meet Amador, Chase moves into position with the CTU Delta team.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While Jack and the Salazars prepare to take Nina to meet Amador, Chase moves into position with the CTU Delta team; and Sherry helps Palmer fight Milliken.

includedAssets.title: Day 3: 12 Midnight  To 1:00 A.M.
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep12 - Day 3: 12 Midnight  To 1:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: As Nina takes delivery of the virus from Amador, CTU moves in to intercept it. Meanwhile, Sherry fails in her first attempt to blackmail Milliken.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Nina takes delivery of the virus from Amador, CTU moves in to intercept it. Meanwhile, Sherry fails in her first attempt to blackmail Milliken.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Nina takes delivery of the virus from Amador, CTU moves in to intercept it. Meanwhile, Sherry fails in her first attempt to blackmail Milliken.

includedAssets.title: Day 3: 1:00 A.M. To 2:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: As Jack flies Nina back to LA, she unleashes a computer virus she planted at CTU. Sherry confronts Milliken about his involvement in the hit and run murder.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Jack flies Nina back to LA, she unleashes a computer virus she planted at CTU. Sherry confronts Milliken about his involvement in the hit and run.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Jack flies Nina back to LA, she unleashes a computer virus she planted at CTU. Sherry confronts Milliken about his involvement in the hit and run murder.

includedAssets.title: Day 3: 2:00 A.M. To 3:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Jack and Kim face off against Nina, and Chase has some explaining to do when his secret is revealed. Plus, Sherry covers up her involvement in Milliken's death.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jack and Kim face off against Nina, and Chase has some explaining to do when his secret is revealed.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jack and Kim face off against Nina, and Chase has some explaining to do when his secret is revealed. Plus, Sherry covers up her involvement in Milliken's death.

includedAssets.title: Day 3: 3:00 A.M. To 4:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Jack finally catches Amador, but it could be too late as the virus is about to be released on LA. Plus, Sherry sinks further into her web of lies.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jack finally catches Amador, but it could be too late as the virus is about to be released on LA. Plus, Sherry sinks further into her web of lies.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jack finally catches Amador, but it could be too late as the virus is about to be released on LA. Plus, Sherry sinks further into her web of lies.

includedAssets.title: Day 3: 4:00 A.M. To 5:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Jack allows Amador to escape so he can track him; panic spreads as the virus infects the hotel; and Palmer has to decide whether to lie to protect Sherry.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jack allows Amador to escape so he can track him; panic spreads as the virus infects the hotel; and Palmer has to decide whether to protect Sherry.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jack allows Amador to escape so he can track him; panic spreads as the virus infects the hotel; and Palmer has to decide whether to lie to protect Sherry.

includedAssets.title: Day 3: 5:00 A.M. To 6:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: A dying Alvers gives Jack enough information to identify the man in control of the virus. At the hotel, the virus takes its first victim.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A dying Alvers gives Jack enough information to identify the man in control of the virus. At the hotel, the virus takes its first victim.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A dying Alvers gives Jack enough information to identify the man in control of the virus. At the hotel, the virus takes its first victim.

includedAssets.title: Day 3: 6:00 A.M. To 7:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Saunders has Palmer in a corner - kill Chapelle or else. At the moment of reckoning Kim identifies a lead in Phoenix, and at the hotel a guest goes missing.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Saunders has Palmer in a corner - kill Chapelle or else. Kim identifies a lead in Phoenix, and at the hotel a guest goes missing.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Saunders has Palmer in a corner - kill Chapelle or else. At the moment of reckoning Kim identifies a lead in Phoenix, and at the hotel a guest goes missing.

includedAssets.title: Day 3: 7:00 A.M. To 8:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Tony wants to bring Saunders' daughter in but Jack has another, far riskier, plan. Bill Cole is at large... and he's infectious. Saunders makes a grave demand.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Tony wants to bring Saunders' daughter in but Jack has another, far riskier, plan. Bill Cole is at large... and he's infectious.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Tony wants to bring Saunders' daughter in but Jack has another, far riskier, plan. Bill Cole is at large... and he's infectious. Saunders makes a grave demand.

includedAssets.title: Day 3: 8:00 A.M. To 9:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: While Jack questions Jane about her father, Saunders gives the order for the virus to be released in San Francisco. Michelle is in the clear... for now.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Jack questions Jane about her father, Saunders gives the order for the virus to be released in San Francisco.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While Jack questions Jane about her father, Saunders gives the order for the virus to be released in San Francisco. Michelle is in the clear... for now.

includedAssets.title: Day 3: 9:00 A.M. To 10:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Tony's loyalties are tested when Saunders kidnaps Michelle and orders Jane's release. Will Jack's number two betray CTU?
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Tony's loyalties are tested when Saunders kidnaps Michelle and orders Jane's release. Will Jack's number two betray CTU?
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Tony's loyalties are tested when Saunders kidnaps Michelle and orders Jane's release. Will Jack's number two betray CTU?

includedAssets.title: Day 3: 10:00 A.M. To 11:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Tony's plan to use Jane as a bargaining chip for Michelle's freedom goes awry when Michelle takes matters into her own hands. Chase and Kim discuss a small matter.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Tony's plan to use Jane as a bargaining chip for Michelle's freedom goes awry when Michelle takes matters into her own hands.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Tony's plan to use Jane as a bargaining chip for Michelle's freedom goes awry when Michelle takes matters into her own hands. Chase and Kim discuss a small matter.

includedAssets.title: Day 3: 11:00 A.M. To 12:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: With just two hours to go, Jack hunts for 11 vials of the virus; Julia Milliken cracks with explosive results; and Tony faces charges of treason.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: With just two hours to go, Jack hunts for 11 vials of the virus; Julia Milliken cracks with explosive results; and Tony faces charges of treason.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: With just two hours to go, Jack hunts for 11 vials of the virus; Julia Milliken cracks with explosive results; and Tony faces charges of treason.

includedAssets.title: Day 3: 12:00 P.M. To 1:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: A staggering climax to 23 hours of time-defying action. One vial of the virus stands between calamity and calm. Will Jack beat the odds and save LA?
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A staggering climax to 23 hours of time-defying action. One vial of the virus stands between calamity and calm. Will Jack beat the odds and save LA?
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A staggering climax to 23 hours of time-defying action. One vial of the virus stands between calamity and calm. Will Jack beat the odds and save LA?

includedAssets.title: Season 3
includedAssets.synopsis: Jack races against time to prevent a face from his past releasing a deadly virus upon Los Angeles. Third season of the heart-racing thriller starring Kiefer Sutherland and Elisha Cuthbert.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jack races to prevent a face from his past releasing a deadly virus. Third season of the heart-racing thriller starring Kiefer Sutherland.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jack races against time to prevent a face from his past releasing a deadly virus upon Los Angeles. Third season of the heart-racing thriller starring Kiefer Sutherland and Elisha Cuthbert.

includedIn.synopsis: Jack Bauer, Director of Field Ops for the Counter-Terrorist Unit of Los Angeles, races against the clock to subvert terrorist plots and save his nation from ultimate disaster.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: Jack Bauer, Director of Field Ops for the Counter-Terrorist Unit of Los Angeles, races against the clock to subvert terrorist plots and save his nation from ultimate disaster.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: Jack Bauer, Director of Field Ops for the Counter-Terrorist Unit of Los Angeles, races against the clock to subvert terrorist plots and save his nation from ultimate disaster.
